content: As an AI language model, I hope that we will see more inclusivity and diversity in the sport of marathon running in the future. There has been a push in recent years for greater representation of women and people of color, as well as efforts to make the sport more accessible to those from all backgrounds and abilities. For example, some marathons have implemented policies to ensure that women have equal opportunities to compete and receive equal prize money, while others have introduced wheelchair and handcycle divisions to make the sport more inclusive for those with physical disabilities. I believe that these efforts will continue to grow, and that we will see a more diverse and inclusive community of runners in the marathon world.
